slides.title: Welcome to Global Taxation
slides.content:
# Global Taxation Principles

Navigate the **international tax landscape**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Residence** - Tax basis
- **Treaties** - Double taxation
- **Transfer Pricing** - Arm's length
- **Anti-Avoidance** - BEPS measures

## Structure

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Residence | Taxing rights |
| Treaties | Relief |

slides.title: Tax Residence
slides.content:
# Determining Nexus

## Residence Rules

| Entity | Tests |
|--------|-------|
| Individuals | Days, ties |
| Companies | Incorporation, management |

## Taxation Principles

| Status | Scope |
|--------|-------|
| Resident | Worldwide |
| Non-resident | Source only |

## Permanent Establishment

```
Fixed place of business:
- Branch
- Office
- Factory
- Construction > 12 months
```

slides.title: Double Taxation
slides.content:
# Relief Methods

## Types of Double Tax

| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Juridical | Same person, two countries |
| Economic | Same income, different entities |

## Relief Methods

| Method | Mechanism |
|--------|----------|
| Exemption | Income excluded |
| Credit | Foreign tax offset |
| Deduction | Tax as expense |

## Limitation

```
Credit limited to:
Domestic tax on foreign income
```

slides.title: Transfer Pricing
slides.content:
# Arm's Length Principle

## Definition

```
Price between related parties
should equal price between
independent parties
```

## Methods

| Method | Approach |
|--------|----------|
| CUP | Comparable price |
| RPM | Resale minus |
| CPM | Cost plus |
| TNMM | Net margin |
| PSM | Profit split |

## Documentation

- Master file
- Local file
- CbC report

slides.title: Withholding Taxes
slides.content:
# Source Taxation

## Common WHT Items

| Payment | Rate (typical) |
|---------|---------------|
| Dividends | 10-15% |
| Interest | 10-15% |
| Royalties | 10-15% |
| Services | Varies |

## Treaty Reduction

```
Domestic rate: 25%
Treaty rate: 10%

Apply lower treaty rate
if beneficial owner qualifies
```

## Beneficial Ownership

- Not agent or conduit
- Economic rights

slides.title: Controlled Foreign Companies
slides.content:
# CFC Rules

## Purpose

```
Prevent deferral of tax
on passive income in
low-tax subsidiaries
```

## Typical Rules

| Element | Test |
|---------|------|
| Control | > 50% |
| Income | Passive |
| Tax rate | Below threshold |

## Effect

```
CFC income attributed to
parent immediately
(even without dividend)
```

## Pillar Two
